abstract.t: There is a need to document data defined in YANG models when a live YANG server is not available. Data is often needed already at design or implementation time or needed by groups that do not have a live running YANG server available. This document specifies a standard file format for YANG instance data (which follows the syntax and semantic from existing YANG models, re-using the same format as the reply to a <get> operation/request) and decorates it with metadata.
